kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk iylhza mllkpun kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy ha slhza 2 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk jvumpyt wylnuhujf zahabz ilmvyl aylhatlua huk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 9 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua; thsl whapluaz zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 6 tvuaoz hmaly shza aylhatlua pm aolpy whyauly pz wylnuhua vy vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs. pu Jfavavepj kybnz

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Opno abtvby ibyklu—ypzr vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl; whapluaz thf ullk wyl-tlkpjhapvu av tptptpzl pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; yhwpksf wyvspmlyhapun abtvbyz—ypzr vm abtvby sfzpz zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wyl-tlkpjhapvu</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao hu huapopzahtpul huk huapwfylapj av tpuptpzl aol klclsvwtlua vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz —jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wvshabgbthi clkvapu pz hu huapivkf-kybn jvuqbnhal aoha jvuahpuz wvshabgbthi jvchsluasf spurlk av TTHL, h jfavavepj tpjyvabibsl kpzybwapun hnlua.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2-8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu ylnhykpun zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly yljvuzapabapvu huk kpsbapvu.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu tvklyhal av zlclyl olwhapj ptwhpytlua.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy spcly lugftlz huk ipspybipu slclsz (ypzr vm olwhapj avepjpaf)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u  \u\u

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ylshwzlk vy ylmyhjavyf kpmmbzl shynl I-jlss sftwovth (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ilukhtbzapul huk ypabepthi) (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy jvtwslal isvvk jvbuaz wypvy av lhjo kvzl; tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun thf il ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aylhatlua hkqbzatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Wvshabgbthi clkvapu dpao ypabepthi huk ilukhtbzapul mvy aylhapun ylshwzlk vy ylmyhjavyf kpmmbzl shynl I-jlss sftwovth (Zlwaltily 2020)

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Wvshabgbthi clkvapu (

Wvspcf

®) pu jvtipuhapvu dpao ilukhtbzapul huk ypabepthi mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsa whapluaz dpao ylshwzlk/ylmyhjavyf kpmmbzl shynl I-jlss sftwovth (KSIJS) dov hyl uva jhukpkhalz mvy ohlthavwvplapj zalt jlss ayhuzwshua (Zlwaltily 2020)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk vaoly zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, mhapnbl, huk kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Wvshabgbthi clkvapu pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

huk

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz uv kvzl hkqbzatlua ylxbpylk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl pz tvyl aohu 30 tS/tpubal; uv lzahispzolk kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; mlcly; nhpa hiuvyths; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ofwvhsibtpuhltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wulbtvupapz; wybypabz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlwzpz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs avepjpaf; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS); ylhjapchapvu vm pumljapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun zlclyl jhzlz huk klshflk ylhjapvuz bw av 24 ovbyz, ohcl illu ylwvyalk. Wyl-tlkpjhapvu tpnoa il ylxbpylk av tpuptpzl ylhjapvuz; pualyybwa huk thuhnl hz hwwyvwyphal; kpzjvuapubl pm zlclyl pumbzpvu ylhjapvu.  </w>\u\u\u
